definition: a piece of furniture that stands at the side of a dining room, to strike, beat repeatedly
details:
noun
- a piece of furniture that stands at the side of a dining room
= synonyms: counter
- usually inexpensive bar
= synonyms: snack bar, snack counter
- a meal set out on a buffet at which guests help themselves
verb
- to strike, beat repeatedly
= example: to strike, beat repeatedly
= synonyms: buff
- to strike against forcefully
= example: to strike against forcefully
= synonyms: batter, knock about
